title: Nothing Can Trouble

lyrics.text:
Nada te turbe, nada te espante
quien a Dios tiene nada le falta.
Nada te turbe, nada te espante
Sólo Dios basta.

Nothing can trouble, nothing can frighten.
Those that seek God shall never go wanting.
Nothing can trouble, nothing can frighten.
God alone fills us.

author: Taize Community
